oai_dc:dc.dc:title: New multiresolution motion estimation and compensation scheme
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KARLEKAR, JAYASHREE
DESAI, UB
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: errors
motion compensation
motion estimation
prediction theory
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper, we propose a new algorithm to improve multiresolution motion estimation (MRME) for low bit-rate applications. In this algorithm, a new multiresolution sum of absolute difference (MSAD) error criterion is introduced which reduces the prediction error between two blocks without increasing the number of motion vectors in the wavelet domain. The performance of the algorithm is compared with some other existing techniques.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Proceedings of the 1999 IEEE International Symposium on Circuits and Systems (V 4), Orlando, USA, 30 May-2 June 1999, IV-459-IV-462
